<Text: The Telltale Head:  The town's residents, including the three boys, are horrified and Bart regrets his actions.>

Text: The Telltale Head:  After telling his family, Homer and Bart head to the center of town, where they are met by an angry mob.
Triplets:<The Telltale Head
7:
--------------------
Text: The Telltale Head:  The episode's title is a reference to the short story "The Tell-Tale Heart" by Edgar Allan Poe.
